## Likelihood Function

$$
\begin{equation*}
    f(y) = \begin{cases}
        \pi & \text{if } y = 0\\
        (1-\pi)\text{Gamma}(k,\theta) & \text{if } y > 0
    \end{cases}
\end{equation*}
$$
